titles.title: HEAL Maui Act
HEAL Maui Act
Healing and Economic Advancement for Local businesses in Maui Act
To provide loans and other financial assistance to small businesses affected by the wildfires on Maui, and for other purpose.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Small Business, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
